childMdx.excerpt: Still a foolish scholar, still a naked man bare before the gaze, now gifted simplicity.   None of this matters: reality is nothing like a…
Belonging wholly to a patch of grass is the greatest  gift today has given me.   The sun, dancing trees and whispers of a world without me…
We went all the way from Gilgamesh to the event horizon, here in the family tomb with two dogs, bearers of a single letter, and a cat from…
